com.sb.elsinore

Class BrewServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sb.elsinore.NanoHTTPD
      • com.sb.elsinore.BrewServer

  • public class BrewServer
extends NanoHTTPD
    A custom HTTP server for Elsinore. Designed to be very simple and lightweight
    Author:
    Doug Edey

    • Method Detail

      • serve

        public final NanoHTTPD.Response serve(java.lang.String uri,
                       NanoHTTPD.Method method,
                       java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> header,
                       java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> parms,
                       java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> files)
        The main method that checks the data coming into the server.
        Overrides:
        serve in class NanoHTTPD
        Parameters:
        uri - The URI requested
        method - The type of the request (GET/POST/DELETE)
        header - The header map from the request
        parms - The incoming Parameter map.
        files - A map of incoming files.
        Returns:
        A NanoHTTPD Response Object

      • serveFile

        public NanoHTTPD.Response serveFile(java.lang.String incomingUri,
                           java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> header,
                           java.io.File homeDir)
        Serves file from homeDir and its' subdirectories (only). Uses only URI, ignores all headers and HTTP parameters.
        Parameters:
        incomingUri - The URI requested
        header - The headers coming in
        homeDir - The root directory.
        Returns:
        A NanoHTTPD Response for the file
